ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Implicit in your statement is the assumption that old people are less interested in power and masculinity, and are more cerebral...but I don t see a
ygData.messageBody:
--- John Grady <john_grady@...> wrote:
> --- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...> wrote:
>
>> On another note, a year or two back, we did a little survey to find out
>> how old people on this mailing list were and it turned out that we have a
>> more "mature" group than would be indicated by general game
>> demographics.
>
> That kinda makes sense. Bards don't easily translate into power,
> masculinity, etc. And they are a
> little more cerebral than most classes.

Implicit in your statement is the assumption that old people are less
interested in power and masculinity, and are more cerebral...but I don't see
a factual basis for either of these assumptions...
